content: आश्वासः {@--1@} Taking or recovering breath, breathing freely, recovery, revival. {@--2@} Consolation, cheering up, inspiring confidence; <ls>U. 6. 10.</ls> {@--3@} An assurance of safety or protection. {@--4@} Cessation, completion, stop. {@--5@} A chapter or section of a book. {@--6@} A probable story.
